## Quarto


```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(dslabs)
```

Using the mutate function to add a column  

```{r}
murders <- mutate(murders, rate = total/population/100000) 
murders <- mutate(murders, rank = rank(-rate))
select(murders, rank, rate, state)
filter(murders, rank %in% c(1:5))
filter(murders, state != "Florida")
```
